author: Staff Reporter
text:
Cash to the tune of Rs.9 lakh was seized from various check-posts here by election flying squads.

A car from Bengaluru, headed towards Bagalur, was intercepted.

The owner, Naresh Patel, was carrying Rs.6.80 lakh, purportedly to purchase plywood from a firm in Bagalur.

However, since he did not carry any relevant documents to support his claim, the cash was seized.

In another incident, a car bearing AIADMK flag on the hood was intercepted, and Rs.1 lakh in cash was found in it by the flying squad at the Krishnagiri toll gate.

The car, owned by Ravichandran, an AIADMK functionary, was carrying his son Ramkumar.

According to the occupant, the money was to pay insurance for a newly purchased car.

The cash was seized since it had no supporting documents.

Similarly, Rs.1.41 lakh was seized from another vehicle at Kakkanur check-post on Thursday.
title: Rs. 9 lakh seized
